name: dynamodb-data-types
description: A utility for Amazon DynamoDb Data Types for AWS SDK for Node.js.

scripts.test: istanbul cover --include-all-sources --dir coverage/spec --root lib jasmine-node tests/spec
scripts.test-preserve-arrays: istanbul cover --include-all-sources --dir coverage/spec-preserve-arrays --root lib jasmine-node tests/spec-preserve-arrays
scripts.build-browser: browserify browser.js > dist/dynamodb-data-types.js && uglifyjs dist/dynamodb-data-types.js --source-map dist/dynamodb-data-types.min.map -o dist/dynamodb-data-types.min.js
